name: Bricklot Studios
description:
Welcome to Bricklot Studios!

Bricklot Studios is a project aiming to recreate the 2002 browser game "LEGO® Studios Backlot" using Unity.

It will be a complete remake, keeping memorable elements of the original game, yet updating it with modern mechanics and visuals.
___________________________________________________

Join the Discord for the latest updates!
https://discord.gg/rEcNa794Ek
